# Ashur Assur ⇔ Shar & 𒀭𒅖𒋻 iš-tar Ishtar

𒀭 ≈ 𒐀𒁹
𒀭 𒊹 ≈ 𒐀𒁹𒎗 Aššur
𒀭𒊹 ≈ 𒐀𒐼 Aššur ⇔ 𒃻 šá 𒀸𒐼 ≈ 𒋩 𒉻 šar Ašur 𒀭𒊹 Aštar 𓇼 Ishtar
𒀭𒊹 ≈ 𒀸𒋩 Assur

𒁹 dašer 10 ᵈašur עֲסַר ʿăsar עַסְרָא ʿasrā
𒁹 dasher 10 ᵈassur ዐሥር ʿäśśər ⇔ 𒀭𒁹 ᵈAshur

𒀸𒋩𒆠 Aššūr “Assur” 𒋩 𒀸𒃻 𒀸𒐼 𒐀𒐼 𒐀𒃻

𓂀

𐘱𐘞 JA-SA Yasser Yasir 𐘇𐘞𐘞𐘴𐙱 A-SA-SA-RA Ashur 𓂀 Osiris 𓁹 𓊩 because of 𐘱 eye 'secret, bound'

Syria Assyria

Subartu Azuḥinum
Subaria Assurinum

𒀀𒋛𒊑 a-si-ri asiri əsir يسير yasīr Asyrer "prisoner of war" ⇔ 𓋴 𓐓 𓌇 𓋹 Syrian < 𓋴 𓈎 𓂋 𓐓 𓋹 𓀏 Sqiri գերի geri

𒀀𒋩𒊏 ʷa-sur-ra ʷasura Wasser "water from the depths"

𒀸𒋗𒉿 aš-šu-wa /Aššuwa/ “northwest Anatolia”
𐀀𐀯𐀹𐀊 a-si-wi-ja aswijaː

𔖢𔖲 su.ri/a Syria 𔒂𔑵 sú.rú 𔒂𔑴 súru₂ 𔑳𔗑 ?

𓈙 𓆄 𓅱 𓀭 | Shu | "Sky" air God ⇔ Salam (peaceful) dry, Shu and Tefnut first couple of the Ennead

𓇳 •šura хур xur Sarah 🌞 sun

𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𒐼 𒀸𒐼 𒃻 𒋩 𒉻 šar Ašur Ashur 𒀸𒃻 aš.šá® 𒃻 GAR 𓆰 grass 𒊸 SHAR 𒊺 SHE 𒉻 ŠUK

𓆼 thazar 1000 > هزار hezâr हज़ार hazār taur
𓆼 thazar > հազար hazar > azar > Ashur 𒀭 𒋩 𒀸𒃻 𒀸𒐼 as+ur 𒀸𓃾 << 𒐀𒐼 𒐀𒃻

𒀾𒋗𒊏𒅀 Aššūrāyu Ἀσσυρία Assuría Assyria

𒀸 𒐼 AS+SAR = 𒋩 Ashur / Assyr 𒃻
𒉻 Sukulente
𓊩 𓁹 Ashurᵘˢ ⋍ Osiris ⇔ Horse 𓃗
𓅆 Horus ⇔ Ashurᵘˢ
𓇳 اَلسَّاعَة Assura Ashur Ašur Aššur Assyr Sarah
𓇯 𐌀𐌉𐌈𐌕𐌓𐌀 𓄿 𓊃 𓂋 𓏏 𓇯 aiθtra† ether™ 𓄿 𓊃 𓂋 𓏏 𓇯 Azurit => Ashur : heaven, sky ⇔ Istra 𓊨 𓏏 𓁐 𓅆
𓇯 air < āēr ἀήρ aḗr ουρανός ouranós ⇔ αὔρᾱ aúrā aurōra ⇔ früh πρωΐ prōḯ proto 𓊪𓏏𓇯𓀭
𓇯 air, the word for air is often simply written as Air 𓄿

𓇯 : 𓄿 𓊃 𓂋 𓏏 𓇯 𐌀𐌉𐌈𐌕𐌓𐌀 aiθtra† ether™ (turned earth:)
󴃙 : 𓄿 𓎡 𓂋 Aker (divinity) , the earth, earth-gods | Acker +++++ AGRO agrar

𓁷 𓂋 𓏏 𓏏 Azurit ⇔ azure (blue) lapis l'azuli ⇔ petra

Aššūr

Assur (political capital of Assyria from the XIV to the IX centuries BCE)

𒀀𒋛𒊒 a-si-ru Assyrer
𒀀𒋛𒊒 captive, prisoner of war

𒀀𒈾𒆪 𒁹𒀭 𒊹 𒆕 𒀀 𒈗 𒃲 𒈗 𒃩𒉡 𒈗 𒋙 𒈗 𒆳 𒀸𒋩𒆠
a-na-ku mAN.ŠAR₂-DU₃-A LUGAL GAL LUGAL dan-nu LUGAL ŠÚ LUGAL KUR aš-šurki
/anāku, Aššur-bani-apli, šarru rabû, šarru dannu, šarru kiššati, šarru māt Aššūr/
I, Ashurbanipal, great king, strong king, king of the world, king of Assyria

Cuneiform spellings Logograms Phonetic
